meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Learn how {APP_NAME} collects, uses, and protects your personal information and uploaded images.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Welcome to {APP_NAME} ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered image upscaling and enhancement service.
introduction.paragraph2: By using {APP_NAME}, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

account.title: 2.1 Account Information
account.intro: When you create an account, we collect:
items: Email address
Name (if provided)
Password (stored securely using industry-standard hashing)
Authentication data from third-party providers (Google) if you choose to sign in with OAuth

images.title: 2.2 Uploaded Images
images.intro: When you use our service, you upload images for processing. We:
items: Process your images using AI technology to enhance or upscale them
Do not permanently store your original or processed images on our servers after processing is complete
Do not use your images to train AI models or for any purpose other than providing the requested service

payment.title: 2.3 Payment Information
payment.description: We use Stripe to process payments. We do not store your full credit card details on our servers. Stripe handles all payment processing and stores payment information according to their

usage.title: 2.4 Usage Data
items: IP address
Browser type and version
Pages visited and time spent
Device information
Referring website
Processing history (number of images processed, credits used)

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the collected information to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process your image enhancement requests
Manage your account and credit balance
Process payments and send transaction receipts
Send service-related communications (password resets, account notifications)
Respond to customer support requests
Analyze usage patterns to improve our service
Detect and prevent fraud or abuse

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:

providers.label: Service Providers:
providers.description: Third-party services that help us operate our platform (e.g., Stripe for payments, Supabase for authentication, Google for AI processing)

providers.label: Legal Requirements:
providers.description: When required by law, court order, or governmental authority

providers.label: Business Transfers:
providers.description: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
measures: HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
security.disclaimer: While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.paragraph1: We retain your account information for as long as your account is active. You may request deletion of your account and associated data at any time.
retention.paragraph2: Uploaded images are processed in real-time and are not permanently stored. Transaction records are retained for legal and accounting purposes.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

rightsList.label: Access:
rightsList.description: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you

rightsList.label: Deletion:
rightsList.description: Request deletion of your personal data

rightsList.label: Portability:
rightsList.description: Request a copy of your data in a portable format

rightsList.label: Objection:
rightsList.description: Object to certain processing of your data

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
uses: Analyze usage patterns (via Google Analytics and Amplitude)
cookies.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling them may affect service functionality.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.description: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

international.title: 10. International Data Transfers
international.description: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws. By using our service, you consent to such transfers. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
